crewCards.name: Lila al Bindar
crewCards.specialAbility: Trash a card from your hand and add a Reactor to your discard pile. +1 Action.

crewCards.name: Lee van Cribb
crewCards.specialAbility: Look at the next 3 cards in your draw pile, play 1 without an action, discard others. +1 Action.

crewCards.name: Ada Massa
crewCards.specialAbility: +3 Actions. Requirement for Reactor is 1 less.
